title: Racist who shouted he was 'taking his country back' as he ripped niqab off a Muslim woman is jailed

A racist attacker who ripped a niqab off the face of a Muslim woman and shouted he was ‘taking his country’ back has been jailed. 
The barrister representing racist Peter Scotter told Newcastle Crown Court that it was ‘no coincidence’ the attack happened just weeks after the Brexit vote. 
Scotter, 56, of Beach Street, Roker, Sunderland , assaulted the mother, who was shopping with her nine-year-old son and husband, and said: “You are in our country now, you stupid f Muslim.” 
The force he used to pull off the garment in July last year in the Bridges Shopping Centre, Sunderland, caused her to fall to the floor. Peter Scotter arriving at Newcastle Crown Court (Photo: Newcastle Chronicle) 
He continued to shout abuse, including “take that f off”, “I’m taking my f country back” and “it’s our Britain, stick by our rules, these b**** b**
